headline: Hi! I'm Helene Harmens from Oslo, Norway. I'm a technology enthusiast with experience in IT, 3D & VFX. Currently I'm learning to be a Fullstack Java developer through Experis Academy Norway, and before that I worked as a VFX Compositor at Storm Studios.
summary: I'm now finishing Experis Academy Norway's program in Full-stack Java Deveopment, which provides extensive expertice in Java and Javascript, as well as relevant frameworks, methods, tools and libraries. I have a bachelor's degree in Information Technology, which has given me a solid IT competence in programming, project work, system development, internet technology, e-business, web development, information security, scrum, research methods, entrepreneurship, etc. I also have a master’s degree in Digital Effects and work experience with 3D and visual effects (VFX), which daily involved problem solving, collaboration, working under pressure, flexibility and deadlines. I have experience with leadership roles, marketing, administration and speaking in assemblies through a high level of involvement in projects and positions of trust. I've collaborated with great companies and organisations like Microsoft, NHO and the Norwegian Computer Society. I'm devoted and social, and love to work with other people. It is important for me to help others around me achieve their goals in addition to my own. I take personal pride in everything I do and like to add “the little extra”

education.information:
This master has provided strong theoretical and technical expertice in filmmaking techniques, green screen, MOCAP, computer graphic principles, the fusion of art and technology, personal research, and applied digital effects theory and practice. 
Awarded a master’s with “merit”.
The course included Python interpreter, numbers, strings, lists, control flow tools, functions, data structures, modules, inputs and outputs, errors, exceptions and classes.

education.degree: Bachelor in Information Technology (with specialization in 3D graphics)
education.information: IT Subjects in Java programming, databases, computer technology, project work, system development, internet technology, e-business, web development, information security, scrum, research methods, entrepreneurship, creative development projects, design project, research methods, etc. 3D subjects included architectural visualization, modeling, animation, lighting, optimization and structure, AR, 3D CAD, etc. She worked mainly in the software 3Ds Max, Mudbox and Unity.
Visiting Student Program. University subject completed during the last year of Ullern Upper Secondary School.

Learned narrative techniques in text, sound and image. About media influence, media history and journalism. To design messages, expressions and layouts. Use of form, color, light and sound as a tool. Common programme subjects average grade: 6 (A) Common core subjects average grade: 5 (B)

keyQualifications: Java, Javascript, Python, UML, HTML, CSS, Git, IntelliJ, Eclipse, Apache Maven, Scrum, Jira, Trello, Spring Framework, Spring Boot, Bootstrap 4, REST, Microservices, jQuery, ReactJS, AngularJS, NodeJS, JDBC, Deployment, JDBC, JNLP, WGAG 2.0, TDD, DevOps, Kanban
otherQualifications: 3D (3Ds Max, Maya), VFX (Nuke, Houdini), Photoshop, Premiere

experience.role: Full-stack Java Developer with front end specialization
experience.information: Accelerated learning program for 3 months with the goal of becoming Full-stack Java developer specializing in front end. Selected technologies and frameworks: Java, IntelliJ, Eclipse, UML, Git, Apache Maven, Scrum, Jira, Spring, SpringBoot, JDBC, Deployment, JNLP, REST, Microservices, Web Serves, HTML, CSS, Bootstrap 4, WGAG 2.0, JavaScript, jQuery, ReactJS, AngularJS, NodeJS, TDD, Continuous Integration, DevOps, Extreme programmering, Kanban, Progressiv Web Apps. Completes the certification 'Java SE 8 Programmer I' during this period.

Integrated filmed and rendered elements from multiple sources to create final and lifelike illusions by finding the best and most economical solutions to reach the desired result. She has worked both on commercials and feature films such as “Black Panther” (2018), “the 12th Man” (2017), “Birkebeinerne” (2016) and “Pixels” (2015).

Work involved multi-tasking, serving customers in a friendly and helpful manner, working in a team, working under fast-paced conditions and attempting to limit problems and liability. Previous part-time jobs include working at a smoothie bar, cafe and restaurant.

otherEngagements.information: Talked in front of several hundred girls in Oslo and Hamar to inform and motivate, with the aim to increase the proportion of women in technology education.

Being a student technology leader, shared knowledge among the academic community, arranged courses, gave presentations and lectures, and initiated projects among the students, through the worldwide Microsoft Student Partner educational programme.
Managed the entire voluntary crew system at NDC, Norway’s largest conference dedicated to .NET and agile development.

otherEngagements.role: Leader of the Student Organization “Microsoft Student Community NITH”
otherEngagements.information: Arranged school events and presentations, shared knowledge and inspiration, and helped students with their Microsoft products.

otherEngagements.role: Deputy Leader of Student Organization “Women and IT”
otherEngagements.information: Worked in collaboration with the leader to elevate the IT girl community, as well as arranging events, both social events and events in cooperation with established businesses.

otherEngagements.role: Deputy Leader/co-founder of networking group Ung IT
otherEngagements.information: Co-founded the networking group, acquired other board members, arranged exciting events with speakers and sponsors and managed the promotion and logistics of the events.

otherEngagements.role: Representative for 3D graphics in the marketing team
otherEngagements.information: Represented and promoted the IT bachelor and the 3D program for recruitment of new students and business communities.

certificationsAndAwards.name: Oracle Certified Associate, Java SE 8 Programmer I
3rd in the Norwegian national competition «Årets IT Jente» (“IT Girl of the Year”)
